Blog.post: yeah! first time using bloggy. sian... just finished writting my diary which me and kin meng write together and just finished my report. sia lah.... not feel very tired. wellz....today i did not get a chance to talk or even see fiona sia. feel very the sad. i wanna see her everyday sia....but she like trying to bi mian me lor. she always say she not trying to....but she look like she is lor. sian...i scared later she see this than she hate me even more.... i sure kill myself. wellz....i gotta go...maybe next time i write longer let you all see lor....

wellz...it is just like everyday... sian sian by myself. but today kin meng made me alittle happy lah...he called me in the morning...and we chatted for awhile. than a few hours later...i went to do my report that was due SOO many weeks ago. the report still got alot of things haven write down... sIaNzZ. wanna do one report also very hard. strange... today never got a moment to think about fiona...maybe i was too engrossed in my work...to much things to be done. now i doing my history project...feel sleepy. wellz...can't be bad the whole day right? yeah...my neighbour came and we had a round of monopoly. i got 2000 over dollars and 16 houses. all the rent is like 500-700 over. haha...my neighbour lose money like hell. hehe. wellz...me wanna go and do my project liao....than later go study for my test tmr...buai...

wellz...it is just like everyday... sian sian by myself. but today kin meng made me alittle happy lah...he called me in the morning...and we chatted for awhile. than a few hours later...i went to do my report that was due SOO many weeks ago. the report still got alot of things haven write down... sIaNzZ. wanna do one report also very hard. strange... today never got a moment to think about fiona...maybe i was too engrossed in my work...to much things to be done. now i doing my history project...feel sleepy. wellz...can't be bad the whole day right? yeah...my neighbour came and we had a round of monopoly. i got 2000 over dollars and 16 houses. all the rent is like 500-700 over. haha...my neighbour lose money like hell. hehe. wellz...me wanna go and do my project liao....than later go study for my test tmr...buai...

sian...donch know wat happened to my previous message...looks bad. wellzx...today is another day where i lived without talking to fiona. used to it liao lah... so nvm. sian sian...today kin meng leaved me at 12 because he gotta go for his ncc thingy...wah lao...me so lonely. nobody to talk to. today i see sam sam so sad....i also got abit sad for her lah. i like that one...see friends sad i also feel sad one. haha... today that fernando....say wanna change from pervert to a guai guai kid. in the end he took my hand and put it on ah god's dick... me will keep secret for him one...i will not chu mai you one godfrey! tupid fernando... sian...today go out with my gor gor. he buy cd for me...hot and hard3 the techno cd. now listening to it. sian... think i stop here lah...next time than i write...niteszzz palszzz

hey...i am back again! wellz...today got talk to fiona for awhile...but she seem like she donch wanna talk to me like that. when she hear that i am going home liao...she very happy. i think she no like me! sob!!! nvm...i will still love her. today... kin meng know about my secret. i told him to keep it... i hope he does. sia lah...today got 2 tests...i think i fail. maths i confirm fail...i wanna cry lor...but my gor gor confort me call me donch cry. sianzzz... just finished a friendster bulletin. suddenly feel very failure... tests fail...wanna get fiona...fail... sianz. wish i have something i can do without failing... haiz. i gtg liao lah...buai...write next time

sianz...atiq just now doing the school's idea of having a house program. she keep on polling on the strongly disagree part...than the stupid survery keep on takeing the answer. today take the esprit bag... very heavy. than still take shoe bag...more heavy. sianz.... today like wanna meet fiona. just found out wa 6 is to fiona... DARYL lah! wah lao...me so stupid sia. why not 9 sia? me 9 mah. haha...BHB! like wanna go out with my gor gor...cuz he said that he wanna buy a pure milk bag for me. the one jthat me and jeremy wanna buy for ourself... like friend bag. than i ask him go talk to my gor....which is also his gor. than he talk talk to him lor... not bad eh. maybe later he bag a bag for him! yeah! sian!!! wanna talk to her...but i still think she is running away from me. maybe she still wanna daryl lah. daryl...good luck. get back the girl man..she is great! but heard that daryl is going for felicia... dotz. fiona is thinking of you man! ayar...now miss sim walk here walk there... somremore i gotta go do my things liao. buaisssss.......
